text: Change animation properties fly:
code: library(shiny) library(shiny.emojirain)  ui <- fluidPage(   setup_emoji_handler(),      titlePanel("Dynamic Emoji Rain"),      sidebarLayout(     sidebarPanel(       selectInput("theme", "Choose Theme:",                   choices = c("christmas", "halloween", "birthday",                                "love", "party", "success")),       sliderInput("wind", "Wind Strength:", -2, 2, 0, 0.1),       sliderInput("speed", "Fall Speed:", 0.5, 3, 1.5, 0.1),       actionButton("trigger", "Make it Rain!", class = "btn btn-success")     ),     mainPanel(       h3("Click the button to see your custom shower!")     )   ) )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   observeEvent(input$trigger, {     emit_shower(       session,       emojis = emoji_presets()[[input$theme]],       wind = input$wind,       fall_speed = input$speed,       duration = 5000     )   }) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: Emoji Shower UI Component ‚Äî emoji_shower_ui
text: emojis Character vector emoji characters image URLs display. Defaults Christmas emojis (NULL). Use emoji_presets() pre-made collections provide custom emojis. Supports: Unicode emoji characters (e.g., actual emoji symbols), web image URLs (http://, https://), data URIs, local file paths, files extensions (.jpg, .png, .gif, .webp, .svg). Emojis randomly selected vector animation. trigger Character string specifying trigger animation. Options: "app_load" (automatically triggers page load) NULL (manual trigger via emit_shower() server). Set NULL want control shower appears via user interactions. duration Numeric. Total duration animation milliseconds. Controls long shower effect lasts clearing particles. Recommended range: 2000-10000 (2-10 seconds). Default: 6000 (6 seconds). Shorter durations create quick bursts; longer durations sustain effect. fall_speed Numeric. Gravity/velocity factor controlling fast particles fall. Affects downward acceleration emojis animation. Valid range: 0.5-2.5. Default: 1.5. Lower values create slow, elegant falls; higher values create rapid, dramatic cascades. spin_speed Numeric NULL. Rotation speed degrees per animation frame. Controls spin effect applied particles. Set numeric value (recommended: 1-5) enable rotation, NULL disable rotation (default). Higher values create faster spins. Works great spinning star emojis. particle_count Numeric. Number emoji/image particles emitted per burst. particles create denser shower effect use resources. Valid range: 5-30. Default: 15. Adjust based audience's device capabilities. burst_count Numeric. Number successive bursts animation sequence. burst single emission particles. Multiple bursts create extended animation effect. Valid range: 1-20. Default: 8. Bursts spaced 200ms apart natural staggered effect. image_size Numeric. Size images pixels (applies image URLs, emojis). Controls width height rendered images. Valid range: 16-256 pixels. Default: 32. Emoji characters scale automatically; affects external images. z_index Numeric. CSS z-index animation layer. Default: 9999. Ensure high enough appear top elements. opacity Numeric. Opacity particles (0.0 1.0). Default: 1. min_size Numeric. Minimum font size emoji particles pixels. Default: 20. max_size Numeric. Maximum font size emoji particles pixels. Default: 35. wind Numeric. Horizontal drift bias. Positive values blow right, negative left. Default: 0.
